org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api

类 TimelineReaderClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.service.AbstractService
      • org.apache.hadoop.service.CompositeService
        • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.TimelineReaderClient
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.service.Service
    直接已知子类:
    TimelineReaderClientImpl

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public abstract class TimelineReaderClient
extends org.apache.hadoop.service.CompositeService
    A client library that can be used to get Timeline Entities associated with application, application attempt or containers. This client library needs to be used along with time line v.2 server version.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.hadoop.service.CompositeService

      • getApplicationEntity

        public abstract org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.timelineservice.TimelineEntity getApplicationEntity(org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                                                                       String fields,
                                                                                                       Map<String,String> filters)
                                                                                                throws IOException
        Gets application entity.
        参数:
        appId - application id
        fields - Fields to be fetched. Defaults to INFO.
        filters - Filters to be applied while fetching entities.
        返回:
        entity of the application
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getApplicationAttemptEntities

        public abstract List<org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.timelineservice.TimelineEntity> getApplicationAttemptEntities(org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                                                                                      String fields,
                                                                                                                      Map<String,String> filters,
                                                                                                                      long limit,
                                                                                                                      String fromId)
                                                                                                               throws IOException
        Gets application attempt entities.
        参数:
        appId - application id
        fields - Fields to be fetched. Defaults to INFO.
        filters - Filters to be applied while fetching entities.
        limit - Number of entities to return.
        fromId - Retrieve next set of generic ids from given fromId
        返回:
        list of application attempt entities
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getContainerEntities

        public abstract List<org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.timelineservice.TimelineEntity> getContainerEntities(org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                                                                             String fields,

                                                                                                      throws IOException
        Gets container entities for an application.
        参数:
        appId - application id
        fields - Fields to be fetched. Defaults to INFO.
        filters - Filters to be applied while fetching entities.
        limit - Number of entities to return.
        fromId - Retrieve next set of generic ids from given fromId
        返回:
        list of entities
        抛出:
        IOException
